name: ROSS / Random Old-School Shooter
description:
The FPS back from the early 90's ! Two ready-to-play packages:
  • ROSS: Ultimate Revelation
    • compatible with the 1993 FPS, and its 1995 "ultimate" edition
    • includes: Switcheroom, Endless Torture, Crusades, Doomsday of UAC
  • ROSS: Inferno Earth
    • compatible with the 1994 version, and its 1996 "final" expansion
    • includes: DemonFear, Zone 300, Null Space, Nostromo's Run
Software:
  • Engine: Chocolate Doom
  • Data: FreeDoom
  • Random map generator: SLIGE + ZenNode
  • Classic adventures from https://www.doomworld.com/idgames/

Open-source win32-compatible software, less than 32MB unzipped (each package)
